pr_title: data pack loaded registries util class

timeline.message:
data pack loaded registries util class

Signed-off-by: liach <liach@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Thank goodness this has been added, I was having to use an accessor mixin >.>
timeline.author: Earthcomputer

timeline.bodyText: Maybe register, for consistency with Registry?
timeline.author: Earthcomputer

replies.bodyText: Hmm, this calls MutableRegistry#add, hence I named that. Wonder why that is mutable registry add in the first place
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: This class name is a little verbose, maybe DataPackRegistries, or maybe DynamicRegistries with a javadoc comment saying what it is?
timeline.author: Earthcomputer
